description: The best paint app available for the Palm Pre and Pixi. Update includes new Color Picker (Pre Only) and a new Eraser Tool. Be sure to read the help section for the updates. - Import an image or start with a blank canvas. - Use a variety of tools like Rectange, Circle, Pencil, and Lines. - Control Colors - Select Line widths for the pencil or line tools - Full Screen Editing - Save your creation once you're done. Be sure to read the Help section for info on how to edit in Full Screen mode and save images.
